About.paragraph: The Non-Fungible Token(NFT) represents a unique digital item which can be owned in a block-chain network. NFT market is growing so fast and celebrity tokens and artworks are very popular on the NFT market. Everyday many new collectors enter the market but many artists are waiting to be approved by the big market places.So still there is a room for new NFT markets. BestDrops targets to be the best Decentralized Autonomous NFT market organization as a self governed NFT community which incentivizes the artists to drop their best works to BestDrops Decentralized Application. Drops of artists is continuously rewarded with $BESD coin. There is also a $BEST coin lottery for buyers every week. BestDrops is designed to be a DAO which is governed by its community members who carry governance token $BESD. BestDrops takes a service fee for buyers. Service fees are distributed to DAO members proportional to $BEST coin owning and buyer fee also prevents the wash trades.

data.title: $BESD Token
data.text: BestDrops is introducing its Coin $BESD, a new cryptocurrency ERC-20 token that is used as an incentive to attract the best NFT creators

data.title: DAO
data.text: BestDrops is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) which is governed by its community members. Those carrying $BESD coins have a voice on the platform's future

data.title: NFT Contracts
data.text: BestDrops uses its own ERC-721 and ERC-1155 smart contracts on Ethereum Network for NFT creation. Both single edition and multiple editions of NFTs are supported.

data.title: NFT Create UI
data.text: Famous NFT Artists are invited as creators and the platform gives a NFT drop user interface(UI) for these selected creators.

data.title: NFT Auctions
data.text: NFT collectors can buy new NFT drops by auctions or price offers using their Ethereum wallets by our auction and sale offer contracts.

data.title: Earn $BESD and $ETH
data.text: BestDrop has staking programmes for $BESD and shares $ETH from service fees
